task.title: How to Pay for Airclassroom
task.shortdesc: This section will describe how a customer pays for the room he or she has reserved using the Airclassroom service.

taskbody.context: You have picked the space you want to rent. Now, it is time to pay for it!

choices.choice: Hokie PassportIf you are paying with cash or check, please mail the payments to Dr. Evia at 181 Turner St. NW, Blacksburg, VA 24061. If you are paying with credit card or Hokie Passport, please visit room 309 in Shanks Hall to pay there.

step.cmd: Send the payment to Dr. Carlos Evia in the Virginia Tech English Department
